entry.title: New Paper in Nature Machine Intelligence

link.title: New Paper in Nature Machine Intelligence

entry.content: New paper with NASA in Nature Machine Intelligence on biomonitoring and precision health in deep space supported by artificial intelligence.
entry.summary: New paper with NASA in Nature Machine Intelligence on biomonitoring and precision health in deep space supported by artificial intelligence.

entry.title: New Paper in Nature Machine Intelligence

link.title: New Paper in Nature Machine Intelligence

entry.content: New paper with NASA in Nature Machine Intelligence on biological research and self-driving labs in deep space supported by artificial intelligence.
entry.summary: New paper with NASA in Nature Machine Intelligence on biological research and self-driving labs in deep space supported by artificial intelligence.

entry.title: TxGNN - Zero-shot prediction of therapeutic use

link.title: TxGNN - Zero-shot prediction of therapeutic use

entry.content: New study on zero-shot prediction of therapeutic use with geometric deep learning and clinician centered design. Check out our project website and TxGNN Explorer.
entry.summary: New study on zero-shot prediction of therapeutic use with geometric deep learning and clinician centered design. Check out our project website and TxGNN Explorer.

entry.title: GraphXAI published in Scientific Data
entry.content: Our approach evaluating explainability of geometric deep learning models is published in Scientific Data. Project website.
entry.summary: Our approach evaluating explainability of geometric deep learning models is published in Scientific Data. Project website.

entry.title: Welcoming New Postdoctoral Fellows
entry.content: A warm welcome to postdoctoral fellows Ruth Johnson and Wanxiang Shen. We are thrilled to have them joining us soon and look forward to working together.
entry.summary: A warm welcome to postdoctoral fellows Ruth Johnson and Wanxiang Shen. We are thrilled to have them joining us soon and look forward to working together.

entry.title: New Preprint on Distribution Shifts
entry.content: New preprint on domain adaptation for time series under feature and label shifts. Project website.
entry.summary: New preprint on domain adaptation for time series under feature and label shifts. Project website.

entry.title: PrimeKG published in Scientific Data
entry.content: Our multimodal knowledge graph for precision medicine is published in Scientific Data. Project website.
entry.summary: Our multimodal knowledge graph for precision medicine is published in Scientific Data. Project website.

entry.title: GNNDelete published at ICLR 2023
entry.content: New paper on machine unlearning for graph neural networks accepted at ICLR 2023. Project website.
entry.summary: New paper on machine unlearning for graph neural networks accepted at ICLR 2023. Project website.

entry.title: New Network Principle for Molecular Phenotypes

link.title: New Network Principle for Molecular Phenotypes

entry.content: New paper introducing mutual interactor-based GNN for molecular phenotype prediction at PSB. Project website.
entry.summary: New paper introducing mutual interactor-based GNN for molecular phenotype prediction at PSB. Project website.

entry.title: Can we shorten rare disease diagnostic odyssey?

link.title: Can we shorten rare disease diagnostic odyssey?

entry.content: New preprint! Geometric deep learning for diagnosing patients with rare genetic diseases. Implications for using deep learning on sparsely-labeled medical datasets. Thankful for this collaboration with Zak Lab. Project website.
entry.summary: New preprint! Geometric deep learning for diagnosing patients with rare genetic diseases. Implications for using deep learning on sparsely-labeled medical datasets. Thankful for this collaboration with Zak Lab. Project website.
